content:
Is there anyone like
 me? 
 
 Fred Strydom 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I wonder if there’s another 
 
 me somewhere in the 
 
 world. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Who loks the same. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 And talks the same. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 And even has my curls. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Someone with my eyes my 
 
 ears. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Who even has my laugh. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Who can do what I can do… 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 … and can’t do what I can’t. 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I’ve loked and loked 
 
 everywhere to find another 
 
 me. 
 
 
 
 I went down to the 
 
 park and loked behind the 
 
 tres. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I loked around, up and 
 
 down … 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 … at every single face. 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I couldn’t find another me in any single place. 
 
 
 
 12  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 There’s only one me in the 
 
 world! I’m special, oh it’s 
 
 true! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 13  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 But not just me, don’t you 
 
 se? There’s only one of 
 
 you! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 14
